remarks: The orthocomplement of a subset is a linear subspace of the pre-Hilbert space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
ocvss.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ocvss.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ocv ` W ) $.
ocvlss.l $e |- L = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
ocvlss $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ S C_ V ) -> ( ._|_ ` S ) e. L ) $.
